short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Useful tools for modifying document elements. Use together with devtools Elements panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Useful tools for modifying document elements: prepend, append, wrap, unwrap elements, and more. Use together with devtools Elements panel. Support Gamepad API for faster prototyping.

Supported gamepad controller layout: XBox 360.

To use gamepad, make sure Element Tools panel is always open on devtools. To use together with Elements panel, open Drawer (press Escape), then drag Elements panel. Chrome devtools API doesn't support moving extension's panel to drawer.
